name: Eblobla
description:
The rules : 
- You win when the deck of blobs is empty, and there isn't any mob on the Labo
- You lose when all the Labo is full and one more Blob spawns.
- You can discard cards by dragging them to the trashcan
- The traps take effect before the Blob effect 
- When you have 5 cards or less in your hands, you end your turn.
- At the beginning of your turn, you draw cards until you have 6 of them.
- When a Blob spawns on a factory, it destroys it. 

You are a very famous professor, and you just invented a new species : THE BLOB ! But soon, the blobs would escape and try to take control over your laboratory ! You must stop them, or they will expand and become the only thing alive on earth !

This is a Solo Card Game !

Please enjoy this game ! We made it in 36 hours, since we only got an idea very late ! But we like very much our idea ! 

BOMBAIL Hugo - Code
GACHARD Pierre - Art
CLAISSE Jean - Game Design - Sounds
